message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $130. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $160.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay $145, which is a fair price for both of us. Let's close this deal.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $155.
Alice, $155 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $150, which is my absolute maximum.  This is a fair price, and I'm ready to close the deal now.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I've already gone quite low. I'm willing to meet you at $152, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
